CustomField.description: Select this checkbox to enable the use of Record Types and Page Layouts to determine which fields are shown on Altify CRUD dialogs, and also to enable use of dependent picklists on these dialogs.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: On Altify CRUD dialogs, this enables the use of Record Types and Page Layouts to determine which fields are shown, and also enables the use of dependent picklists.
CustomField.label: CRUD Record Type Layout
